transcript:
Customer: Sorry sir, call disconnect ho gaya tha, line par jud jayega. 
Executive: Ha, ye aapka jo hai na inhone bhi call nahi uthaya hai, usko main de diye hai. Ab main inke manager ko kar raha hu.
Customer: To manager ko pata rahega sab.
Executive: Ha, main kar deta hu na. Inke bhi senior jo hai na koi hai nahi.
Customer: Koi aisa problem nahi hai.
Executive: Nitish Singh.
Customer: Main bhi Sumit ji ko call karke dekhta hu. Call pe bane rahiye.
Executive: Unka number not reachable ja raha hai.
Customer: Main try karke dekhta hu.
Executive: Ab aap abhi try mat kijiye, aap baad me try kijiye. 
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapka call hold par thevla hai. Krupya line par raha. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Krupya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on line.
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapka call hold par thevla hai. Krupya line par raha. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapke call ko hold pe rakha hai. Krupya line par bane rahe. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Krupya line par bane rahe.
Customer: Sumit ji waiting pe hai.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haanji, to abhi main na teeno ko call kar liya. Kisi ne bhi call uthaya nahi hai. To ab aap thoda sa wait kare. Main yaha se jo hai na mail kar deta hu. To let see aapka jo hai na waha se revert mere paas kya aata hai. Dusra ek cheez aapka agar baat ho jati hai aapki, to aap unse jo hai na discussion kar lijiyega. Otherwise main ek baar mail pe discussion kar leta hu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai ji. Aap mera personal number note kar lijiye ek baar. Agar kuch bhi update aapko lena ho to aap mere ko directly call kar sakte hai. Ye mera whatsapp pe aap ek hi vgera kuch dal sakte hai.
Customer: Aap number bataiye sir.
Executive: Ek ye maine DND number pe kiya hua hai. 8484
Customer: 8484
Executive: 044
Customer: 044
Executive: 880
(silence)
Executive: Ye maine aapko jo hai na ping kar diya hai whatsapp ke upar. Aap mere ko kuch bhi update lena rahega agar in the case call nahi bhi lagta hai busy rehta hu to aap mere ko message dal dijiyega, I'll call you back.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
Executive: Thik hai ji. Baki ek baar discussion hone ke baad main apne side se bhi aapko connect karta hu.
Customer: Chalega.
Executive: Rest aapne I think jo hai na 9696 pe call kiya hoga to ye ticket main yaha se band kar raha hu. Baki aapke paas mere contact details hai. Email ID bhi maine aapko drop kar di hai na, right? To aap mere ko kabhi bhi connect kar sakte hai. 9 to 6 ke beech mein.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aapke paas ek feedback mail aayega. Aapse meri baat ho chuki hai to please waha yes mark jarur kar dijiyega.
Customer: Rating issue solve hone ke baad dunga.
Executive: Nahi, rating aap de na de sir, wo ek alag baat hai. But waha par aapko jo hai na option aayega kya naam hai yes or no ka. Aapki baat kyuki ho chuki hai to aap yes mark kare. Baki rating aap jab dena chahe aap de sakte hai.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
Executive: Thik hai, thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's call was disconnected.

- Customer wants to talk to Sumit ji.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to connect with Sumit ji.

- Executive shared his personal number for updates.

- Executive will connect after discussion with team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- call disconnect, personal number, feedback
